Package uk.mqchinee.archelia.raw.projectile

Class BouncyArrow

java.lang.Object
uk.mqchinee.archelia.raw.projectile.BouncyArrow
public abstract class BouncyArrow extends Object
Abstract class representing a bouncy arrow projectile. This class provides methods to handle bouncing behavior for the arrow.

  • Constructor Details

    • BouncyArrow

      public BouncyArrow(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, org.bukkit.entity.Projectile projectile, double threshold, org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity shooter)
      Constructor for the BouncyArrow class.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The JavaPlugin instance associated with this bouncy arrow.
      projectile - The projectile entity representing the arrow.
      threshold - The threshold velocity below which the arrow will be destroyed.
      shooter - The living entity that shot the arrow.

      Gets the velocity of the arrow.
      Returns:
      The velocity vector of the arrow.

      Sets the speed of the arrow by modifying its velocity.

      public void doBounce(org.bukkit.entity.Projectile projectile)
      Performs the bounce action for the arrow.
      Parameters:
      projectile - The projectile entity representing the arrow.

    • transform

      public void transform()
      Initiates the transformation of the arrow. Starts a BukkitRunnable task to handle arrow movement and bouncing behavior.

    • onMove

      public abstract void onMove()
      Called when the arrow moves. Implement this method to handle actions when the arrow is in motion.

    • onEntityHit

      public abstract void onEntityHit()
      Called when the arrow hits an entity. Implement this method to handle actions when the arrow hits an entity.

    • onBounce

      public abstract void onBounce()
      Called when the arrow bounces off a block. Implement this method to handle actions when the arrow bounces off a block.

    • onDestroy

      public abstract void onDestroy()
      Called when the arrow is destroyed or removed. Implement this method to handle cleanup or additional actions when the arrow is destroyed.
